Params: {3: '"She" isn\'t the goddess to whom this eternal dirge created by the waves lapping the shore is dedicated.'}
{3: '"Her" ending is preordained. In countless cycles, she is always imprisoned on this lone island. The shackles are now part of her soul.'}
{3: 'As the tides ebb and flow, and as lives blossom and wither, the forgotten things return to oblivion.'}
{3: 'Who has gazed at "her" with sorrow in their eyes?'}
{3: 'And who has taken away a part of "her"?'}
{3: '"She" was whole once, but then torn apart by time. After hundreds of years of horrible nightmares, time has lost all its meaning.'}
{3: 'What keeps "her" going? Does the present "she" even exist?'}
{3: 'Eventually, a variable appears in this never-changing cycle.'}
{3: 'Who is also left stranded on this lone island?'}
